bibl.title: A Greek Silver Phylactery in the MacDaniel Collection.
bibl.note: Magical phylactery purchased in 1992 for the Classics Department's MacDaniel collection at Harvard (presently stored in the Ancient Art Collection, Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Cambridge, Mass., Access No. TL 33416). Provenance unknown (Levant?). The introductory sequence of ÙnÒmata stands as the longest parallel known so far, in a metal amulet, to the magical papyri (cf. P.G.M. XIXa, 6-9). <onomata>
bibl.seg: HEINTZ Florent, A Greek Silver Phylactery in the MacDaniel Collection.
